DOC.brief_summary: The effectiveness of breathing exercise on anxiety in women during the first period of labor.
DOC.brief_title: Effective Use of Respiratory Patterns in the First Period of Labor in Control of Maternal Anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: The groups will be randomized into intervention groups, which will be held ventilatory patterns while the control group will receive routine care service. The measurements will be made during the admission, and every 2 hours until the final phase of dilation.
DOC.criteria: Primiparous First stage of labor Multiple gestation; Eclampsia; Pregnancy with a dead fetus; Use of analgesia; Pregnant women with clinical instability; Psychiatric disorders;
